issue.title: Empy contact when editing metadata
issue.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

When selecting a linked metadata (for example a point of contact), the formulary automtically select the first contact of the list without allowing empty content.
Behaviour should be the same than other list of choice (the entry is empty per default, and a selected value can be removed)

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.1
